div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 10 Pascha, SW of Cyme, Euboea, 1883 (793) Burial: c. 500-480 B.C. (T) Contents: c. 100? AR Eretria: tetradr. ("a few") 7-8 didr.; "a great many" dr. Athens: 7 Wappenm. didr. c. 70 tetradr. (early owls) Disposition: Berlin 1? (tetradr. Eretria, cf. Köhler, p. 354, note) Köhler, AM 1884, pp. 354 ff. (saw 22+) Seltman, Athens, p. 146 Starr, Athenian Coinage, p. 5, note 13; p. 89
